entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Overhaul Regex's handling of RegexOptions.IgnoreCase #61048
    7.0.0
  • Issue with HexEncoder #61047
  • Error when trying to use Quic with current .NET 6 RC #61046
  • System.Text.Json Serialization Regression in NET6 (Net5 worked) #61044

Closed

  • .NET 6 RC2 websocket receive allocations #61011
  • [mono] Crash in github runner due to null AssemblyLoadContext.GetLoadContext result #60348
    6.0.0
  • DateTime.Parse throw FormatException in centos7.9 #61038

PullRequests

Created

  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Recognize sbfiz/ubfiz idioms #61045
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Some VN refactoring #61034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [arm64] JIT: Fold "A * B + C" to MADD/MSUB #61037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: limited version of forward substitution for some relops #61023
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disable implicit tailcalls for throwhelpers #61006
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
  • [release/6.0] add support for macOS 12 #61028
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging blazor app after ts changes. #60873
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Fix IsContainableImmed for arm64 v8.1 or higher #61035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Removed two unused packages #60798
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` #61020
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
